channel.title: NYC Accountant Recommendations?
channel.description:
Hi Folks!
Long time listener, first time caller.
Since my little company, Valence Labs, has started to bring in a small amount of revenue, I'm now in the position of needing an accountant. I was wondering if any of you had any recommendations for one that is based in NYC?
Thanks for your help!
Aaron

item.title: NYC Accountant Recommendations?
item.dc:creator: arad
item.description:
Sweet! Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: NYC Accountant Recommendations?
item.dc:creator: andrey
item.description:
Tom Morton at Morton & Associates – http://www.mortontax.com/

We’ve used them for years prior to switching all our accounting in-house.

Tom will give you general advice regarding where your company is going (tax-wise), and his team can manage your Quickbooks file for you, so you can have as little or as much involvement as you want.

Read full topic
